subject: Alpine Skiing
New York City Marathon
Gambling
lead_paragraph: New Jersey moved forth in its effort to offer legalized sports betting, and Lindsey Vonn said she would only race against men at the skiing World Cup if she could compete against women a week later.
snippet: New Jersey moved forth in its effort to offer legalized sports betting, and Lindsey Vonn said she would only race against men at the skiing World Cup if she could compete against women a week later.
